OOC: Ummmm I believe thats illegal... Rauq? Yan? Alloran? The silent 
one that never speaks? 

~Qs7- Who recalls Rauq saying weapons that affect multiple units are 
illegal, well wouldnt weapons affecting an entire continent be 
illegal?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Azure The Warrior" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> The transwarp passage opened near the nexus known as Earth. A large 
form 
> then made its way through and flew towards the planet. It 
ressembled some 
> kind of winged whale, but it was obviously not an organic being. 
However, 
> the very way it moved told of organic origins...
> 
> Inside the ship, three transformers operated the Shadow Destiny. 
They were 
> the Prophets, the elite Tripredacus Strike Force.
> 
> Gesper:
> We are on final approach of Earth. Geostationnary orbit in 3,2, 
1... stable 
> orbit achieved.
> 
> The ship's wings flailed in the void of space to keep it over a 
precise 
> continent of the planet.
> 
> Melchana:
> Target in sight. I can fire whenever you wish.
> 
> Belthassan:
> Prepare the key to vector Sigma. Fire when you have a lock.
> 
> Melchana:
> What? We have the key with us? This is utter madness! You 
jeopardize this 
> mission by bringing it with us!
> 
> Belthassan:
> Shut up, sister! The key shall be terminated as soon as we have no 
more use 
> for it, and that time will be right after you have fired it! Now 
stop 
> discussing and do your job!
> 
> Melchana reluctantly agreed with her elder brother, but she would 
never say 
> it to anyone else. She knew it was necessary to the operation...
> She fired and she looked through the monitors. The whole continent 
was being 
> technologicized...
> 
> Belthassan:
> Now, Melchana, fire the reformatting cannon...
> 
> She fired the gun once again. This time, the continent started to 
reflorish 
> and it became techno-organic. Australia had become a fusion of 
organisms and 
> technology.
> 
> Belthassan:
> Prepare for atmospherical entry. Gesper, land the Shadow Destiny at 
the 
> Southeast point of Australia and prepare it for deployment. 
Melchana, track 
> the Hellgate and send a message to lieutenant Daemos concerning our 
arrival. 
> Finally, jettisson the key to vector sigma and fire the 
reformatting cannon 
> on it.
> 
> The key, hit by the ray, started glowing brightly and exploded. Its 
light 
> could be seen from many places on the earth.
>
